tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am really happy with all the dental procedures done by dr Samanvitha shetty her friendly nature makes you comfortable overall I highly recommend her for any dental issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was apprehensive about the pain that I would have to suffer post the tooth extraction but with Dr Malika at the helm, all was a smooth sailing. The procedure was nicely done and I experienced some pain only till a few hours post the procedure. From next day there was no pain and there was no need of pain-killers. I am feeling quite well now, thanks to the Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To start with I have no idea as to what did the doctor do while attending my dental problem.  I had confidence with the doctor and hence I closed my eyes and utilized the time for relaxation. It is a good experience.  To explain so far I have not gone for any such surgery. I recommend to visit smyli dental clinic for friendly treatment. Thank you. Good luck and good health to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
Great doctor who is one stop caring for all my dental issues and I do visit dr for my regular checkup too

I am so impressed with the treatment resulted in all my family members look at dr for all the dental issues

Dr spends ample quality time to explain the issues and I find her extremely passionate about her job

I would highly recommend always
